Cigarettes
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Hoaxes, Myths and Pranks!: Cigarettes
By Anonymous on Wednesday, January 3, 2001 - 01:34 pm:

I have heard of an item called the cigarettes (I know i am spelling it wrong...), what did they do? I might use my gameshark to see what they do.. If anyone knows, can you post/e-mail me.

By Kurasu Soratobu on Wednesday, January 3, 2001 - 01:39 pm:

These are not a hoax, as a matter of fact. They are an item that was taken out of (or locked into, as the case may be) the U.S. version. It is one of those objects that your monster asks for, like matches, grease, polish, silk cloth, etc. etc. They are asked for by katos, and probably reduce a small amount (as in 1 or 2 points) of stress.
The only way you can see them in the U.S. version is to use the Gameshark, however. Guess they don't want kids to see their monsters smoking.
